title: ZhongliMains
description:
Are you a follower of the Geo Archon? Or a believer of the Geo Supremacy? Or are you just looking for Zhongli builds? If so, then why don't you join the Zhongli Mains discord server?

Zhongli Mains is a server dedicated on our beloved Geo Archon, where you can find daily discussions and theorycrafting on how to get the best out of him, as well as a place where you can hang out and chat with other Zhongli players!
